title: Kadhala Kadhala Lyrics Sathuranga Vettai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song : Kadhala Kadhala
Singer(s): Kalyani Nair
Movie: Sathuranga Vettai
Music: Sean Roldan

Kadhala Kadhala
ayyoo idha enna solla. 
Kaattrile kelvigal 
yaarthan vidai kandu solla.

Manase marikka ada yedhu maaraappu.
Manasa thorandhaa
vandhu serum pollaappu.azhage..

Kannellaam un kaatchi
kadhellaam un pechu
ida maara thottramaagane.

Munmaarbil thee moottam
nadu mudhugil kuttraaalam
oru pozhudhil rendu kaalaamey.

Azhaigal pesum oru 
kadalin saarbaaga.
Vizhigal pesum adaenadhu saarbaaga
Uyire..

Uchchi malai paaraiyile
unpeyarau koovinen.
Meendum varum edhir oliyil 
en peyarai kettinen.

Vinnilavin vilumbugalai
ingirundhe thodugiren.
Penaruge avan irundhum
kai nadungi vidugiren.

Oh kolla kollayaai 
ennodu kadhal ulladhu
kollai kadhalil konjamaai
kaamam ulladhu..urave..

Kadhala Kadhala
ayyoo idha enna solla. 
Kaattrile kelvigal 
yaarthan vidai kandu solla.

Manase marikka ada yedhu maaraappu.
Manasa thorandhaa
vandhu serum pollaappu.azhage..
